name: Payment Gateway CashBaba for WC
author: Biswa Nath Ghosh, Sanjib Dhar, Md Sumon Mia

sections.description:
Cashbaba PAYMENT METHOD FOR WOOCOMMERCE

Installation

  1. After activate the plugin you need to go to Woocommerce settings for payments. Here you can see CashBaba as a payment method. Enable this and open settings for this payment method.
  2. Here you will see a link to go to the settings. (Or you may go to the CashBaba Settings from left menu).
  3. Collect your client id, client secret, merchant and customer id from CashBaba. Place this in here and you are able to collect your payment.

Requirements

To install WooCommerce CashBaba Payments, you need:

  • WordPress Version 5.3 or newer (installed)
  • WooCommerce Version 3.9 or newer (installed and activated)
  • PHP Version 7.1 or newer
  • CashBaba business account

Instructions

  1. Log in to WordPress admin.
  2. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  3. Search for the Payment Gateway CashBaba for WC plugin.
  4. Click on Install Now and wait until the plugin is installed successfully.
  5. You can activate the plugin immediately by clicking on Activate now on the success page. If you want to activate it later, you can do so via Plugins > Installed Plugins.

Screenshots

  1. CashBaba buttons on a single product page.
  2. Cart page.
  3. Checkout page.
  4. Enable “CashBaba” on the Payment methods tab in WooCommerce.
  5. Main settings screen.

Woocommerce payment method for Cashbaba for easy checkout.
